title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Solar UV Exposure and Health Management: Practice-Based Training Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic biology knowledge (cells, DNA structure, etc.) and general understanding of UV protection
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the biological effects of solar UV radiation (e.g., skin aging, DNA damage) with scientific evidence.
Learners can suggest at least three practical UV protection strategies for daily life and select them contextually.
Learners can create personalized safe exposure guidelines incorporating UV index data and regional characteristics.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
